description: This file defines FastAPI routes and schemas for interacting with a Supabase database, including querying with filters, ordering, and pagination. It includes classes for request and response schemas, utility functions for validation and query modifications, and a main route handler for executing queries against Supabase tables.

classes.name: SupabaseFilter
classes.description: Represents a single filter on a column with an operator and a value.

classes.name: SupabaseQueryResponse
classes.description: Response schema for Supabase table queries.

methods.name: None _validate_enabled_or_404()
methods.description: Raises HTTP 404 or 503 error if Supabase is disabled or not properly configured.

methods.name: Any _apply_filters(q: Any, filters: Optional[List[SupabaseFilter]])
methods.description: Applies filtering conditions to a Supabase query object based on provided filters.

methods.name: Any _apply_order(q: Any, order_by: Optional[str], order_dir: Optional[str])
methods.description: Applies ordering to a Supabase query object based on provided order parameters.

methods.name: Tuple[Any,Dict[str,Any]] _apply_pagination(q: Any, limit: Optional[int], offset: Optional[int])
methods.description: Adds limit and offset to a Supabase query object and returns associated metadata.

methods.name: SupabaseQueryResponse supabase_query( table: str = Query(..., description="Target table name"), order_by: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Column to order by"), order_dir: Optional[Literal["asc", "desc"]] = Query("asc", description="Sort direction"), limit: Optional[int] = Query(50, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max rows to return"), offset: Optional[int] = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of rows to skip"), filters: Optional[List[SupabaseFilter]] = Body( default=None, description="Optional list of filters to apply to the table query.", ), )
methods.description: Main API route handler for executing a parameterized select query against a Supabase table.

ctags.name: _apply_order
ctags.pattern: /^def _apply_order(q: Any, order_by: Optional[str], order_dir: Optional[str]) -> Any:$/

ctags.name: _apply_pagination
ctags.pattern: /^def _apply_pagination(q: Any, limit: Optional[int], offset: Optional[int]) -> Tuple[Any, Dict[st/

ctags.name: column
ctags.pattern: /^    column: str = Field(..., description="Column name to filter on")$/

ctags.name: items
ctags.pattern: /^    items: List[Dict[str, Any]] = Field(default_factory=list, description="Result rows")$/

ctags.name: supabase_query
ctags.signature: ( table: str = Query(..., description="Target table name"), order_by: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Column to order by"), order_dir: Optional[Literal["asc", "desc"]] = Query("asc", description="Sort direction"), limit: Optional[int] = Query(50, ge=1, le=1000, description="Max rows to return"), offset: Optional[int] = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of rows to skip"), filters: Optional[List[SupabaseFilter]] = Body( default=None, description="Optional list of filters to apply to the table query.", ), )

ctags.name: value
ctags.pattern: /^    value: Any = Field(..., description="Value to compare against")$/
